name: Christmasfire
description:
You are Santa!

Thing is, a FIRE wall is chasing you!

Collect the Presents in each Level and make it out alive.

Controls:

- Movement: WSAD or Arrow keys 

Made the game while I was sick, so it's nothing big.

Still had fun though!

Hope you enjoy!

Game made by Catnotfound

Also I have a Discord!

https://discord.gg/x3X2RYWg

Would appreciate it if you could join!
